about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, loud sounds, and lots of jumpscares.


CornField is a cooperative first-person horror game for 1-5 players. Collect all the necessary items and escape the cornfield! Run, scream, hide, but most importantly don't get caught! You will be chased by a scary monster that hears your voice from your microphone and is definitely trying to kill you!

What is your challenge?

CornField takes place in a corn maze where there are several different items that allow you to get out of the endless corn maze and also help you defend yourself against a killer who decides to try and kill you and maybe even succeed. Be careful though, the killer hears your voice from the microphone and therefore you must be quiet. In some game modes, you or a friend will play as the assassin.

Can you do it?

  • Playability
    CornField has simple controls for surviving in the cornfield yet everything will be explained to you.

  • Online co-op for 1-5 players
    You can play CornField alone or together with your friends. Up to 5 of you can play together. You will all play as a survivor but in some game modes one of you will play as a killer.

  • Repeatability
    The full version of CornField offers many different maps and game modes (but not in demo or early access). You'll never find yourself running out of things to do, thanks to random events you'll be scared forever.

  • Game Modes and Difficulty
    In addition to several CornField maps, the full version also offers several game modes and difficulties.

  • Player progression
    Thanks to several games played, you will grow stronger, both as a killer and as a survivor. Throughout the games, you'll have the power to find money, which will allow you to buy all sorts of items.

  • Features in multiplayer mode
    Take advantage of voice chat that reacts to distance from others. Be careful though, the killer can hear you too and will come after you!

Multiplayer

In addition to the single player mode, CornField also offers multiplayer for up to 5 players. In some situations, you'll have to work together to survive this nightmare and escape without getting killed by the killer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows 7 - 64/32Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows 7 - 64/32Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
